title: can not open the 3 tabs on bottom right
body: friends list, channels. and the notification tab. can not look at my friends to see who is online  it will not let me click it

replies.body:
That's really weird, I've never heard of this issue before. It's possible that a background program is trying to draw over the League client and is causing this, so I recommend [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if this issue persists.
